column4: does anyone have any suggestions on what could be wrong with my computer that's causing it to go black screen after ubuntu loads?
after installation: 1st-recovery mode (second option in Grub menu), 2nd-install ati driver, 3rd- dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
put your livecd, boot, before selecting the boot option (on the boot menu) do F4, select the graphic mode you want
use the resolution that is shown on your montinor manual
did you select the correct frequency?
you'll see the frequency after an '@'
the alternate CD is the only solution for you problem :)
there are already tutorials for that :)
i'm not sure it supports the 686
it has nothing to do with the OS :)
